tool_description: Checks agent availability, workload capacity, and skill matching for ticket assignment and escalation routing.

agent_ids.description: List of agent identifiers to check

check_workload.description: Whether to include current workload in availability check

error_messages: Empty agent list: At least one agent_id must be provided in the agent_ids array.
Invalid agent ID format: Agent IDs must be non-empty strings. Check the format of provided IDs.
Agent not found: One or more agent IDs do not exist in the system. Verify agent identifiers.
Skills database unavailable: Cannot verify agent skills due to system unavailability. Retry later.
usage: Provide a list of agent_ids to check availability. Optionally specify required_skills to filter agents and set check_workload to include capacity analysis.

available_agents.description: List of currently available agent IDs

workload_status.description: Workload status for each agent (light, moderate, heavy)

recommended_agent.description: Best agent for assignment based on availability and skills
